title: Isis Nursing Horus
description:
Bronze statuette of Isis holding the child Horus. Disk and horn headdress. Right hand at breast. Feet rest on small inscribed base.
The inscription commences "May Isis give life" but the remainder is at present undecipherable.
dimensions:
8 3/4 x 2 3/4 x 2 1/8 in. (22.2 x 7 x 5.4 cm)
mount (display dimensions): 9 5/8 x 2 3/8 x 3 1/8 in. (24.4 x 6 x 7.9 cm)

museum_location.name: Old Kingdom to 18th Dynasty, Egyptian Galleries, 3rd Floor

completeness.description: Most data is approved, but records have not been fully vetted. Many objects have quality photos and descriptions.
